description: Try our easy to follow Seafood Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Seafood Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place clams in a saucepan with 1/2 cup water and bring to a gentle boil. Cook for 4 minutes or until clams open. Transfer clams to a bowl using a slotted spoon and reserve cooking water. Cool clams slightly, remove flesh and discard shells.
Cut leek in half lengthways then cut into thin slices. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add leek and cook for 8 minutes or until soft.

Add flour and cook until bubbling. Remove from heat and add 1/2 cup of the reserved clam liquid and the milk. Stir until smooth. Return to heat and cook stirring over a medium heat until sauce thickens. Add capers and thyme, then season to taste.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut hoki and salmon fillets into 3cm cubes. Cut prawns in half. Add fish and prawns to sauce and stir to combine.
Lightly grease a 22cm ovenproof pie dish. Spoon in filling.
Spray filo sheets with oil spray and layer on top of each other. Lay over pie and trim excess. Brush with melted butter and bake for 30 minutes or until golden.
